title: Antioquia Announces Exercise of Warrants by Infinita Prosperidad Minera S.A.C.
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Sep 24, 2015, 00:09 BST - UK Markets open in 7 hrs 51 mins Antioquia Announces Exercise of Warrants by Infinita Prosperidad Minera S.A.C. Press Release : Antioquia Gold Inc. – 42 minutes ago 0.00 Related Content CALGARY, ALBERTA--(Marketwired - Sep 23, 2015) - Antioquia Gold Inc. ("Antioquia" or the "Company") (TSX VENTURE:AGD) is pleased to announce that, Infinita Prosperidad Minera S.A.C., formerly Desafio Minero S.A.C. (" Infinita ") has acquired 14,000,000 common shares of the Company (" Common Shares "), by the exercise of 14,000,000 warrants at an exercise price of $0.05 per warrant for gross proceeds to the Company of $700,000 (" Transaction "). 
Upon completion of the Transaction, Infinita, has beneficial ownership of, and control and direction over, directly or indirectly 147,868,346 Common Shares, or approximately 61.66% of the Common Shares outstanding at such time. 
For further information on Antioquia Gold Inc., visit our website at www.antioquiagoldinc.com . 
Neither the TSX Venture Exchange nor its Regulation Services Provider (as that term is defined in the policies of the TSX Venture Exchange) accepts responsibility for the adequacy or accuracy of this release.
